item.title: Funkier House Vibes Show 5th May 2012
item.description: Funkier House Vibes Radio Show on ssRadio with DJ Wisp [CD Friendly Mix] Genre this week is... Soulful & Funky/Jackin House including best of played tracks from DJ Wisp & Mojito... Soul Kandi 6 @ The Lane Bar, London If you like what you hear and want keep upto date, become a fan here: www.facebook.com/djwisp or follow on www.twitter.com/dj_wisp Full Tracklist Here: http://ssradiouk.com/2012/05/05/funkier-house-vibes-5th-may-2012/ Listen Live Every Other Saturday 10am - 12pm GMT: http://ssradiouk.com/wp-content/themes/ssradio/popup.php

item.title: HouseDown Mix (Funky and Jackin House)
item.description: HouseDown Guest Mix For 'HouseDown Promotions' http://housedownpromo.podomatic.com/ Genre: Funky & Jackin House Playlist: 01. The House Inspectors - Come Back 02. The House Inspectors - Madusa 03. Scott Diaz - Turn The Lights Down 04. The House Inspectors - Alright 05. Scott Diaz - Get Your Music On 06. Christian Alvarez - Be Cool 07. Soul De Marin - Break The House Down 08. The House Inspectors & Random Soul - Front To Back 09. Corduroy Mavericks - Unsettled 10. Soul De Marin - Bring It Back 11. Joey Youngman - Twelve Bits Of Love 12. Jazzmopper J - Trick Or Treat Mixed By DJ Wisp
item.dc:creator: DJ_Wisp
item.itunes:summary:
